NumberTheory.title: Number Theory
NumberTheory.introduction: Number Theory is the study of integers and their properties. It's a foundational area of mathematics with applications in cryptography, computer science, and more.

sections.title: What is Number Theory?
sections.content: Number Theory is a branch of mathematics that studies the properties of integers. It's often considered one of the purest forms of mathematics, yet it has surprising applications in modern technology, especially in cryptography and computer science.

sections.title: Historical Background
sections.content: Number Theory has a rich history dating back to ancient civilizations. Mathematicians like Pythagoras, Euclid, and Diophantus made significant contributions. In more recent times, figures like Fermat, Euler, and Riemann have advanced the field tremendously.

sections.title: Key Concepts
sections.content:
Some fundamental concepts in Number Theory include:
- Prime numbers
- Divisibility
- Congruences
- Diophantine equations
